instruction_name.description: The name of the instruction as defined in the program.

function_logic.description: The function logic written in Anchor / Rust for the given instruction. Do not include the function signature, imports, or other code â€“ just the function logic inside the curly braces.

items.description: A list of additional imports required for the specific instruction.

additional_imports.description: Any additional imports needed for this instruction to function correctly. Don't include any pre-existing imports.
